sceneDescription.title: First Glimpse of Perfection at the Theater

setting.location: Grand theater interior with ornate balconies and crystal chandeliers, Warsaw's cultural center
setting.weather: Warm gaslight illumination contrasting with cold winter outside

characters.appearance: Young woman, early 20s, ethereally beautiful, pale complexion, golden hair arranged in elaborate coiffure, slender graceful neck
characters.clothing: Cream silk evening gown with delicate lace trim, pearl necklace, long white gloves, small jeweled fan
characters.position: Seated in elegant theater box, posture perfectly erect, gazing down at stage
characters.action: Sitting motionless like porcelain figurine, occasionally lifting opera glasses to survey audience below

characters.appearance: Middle-aged man, 40s, tall athletic build, dark hair with gray temples, intense penetrating eyes
characters.clothing: Black evening coat with white bow tie, polished shoes, white gloves held in one hand
characters.position: Standing in shadows at back of theater, partially concealed behind marble column
characters.action: Staring upward at the theater box with expression of complete fascination, forgotten about the performance

scene.mainElements: Opulent theater interior with red velvet seats, gilded balcony railings, massive crystal chandelier casting prismatic light, audience in formal evening wear
scene.details: Ornate plasterwork decorations on ceiling and walls, heavy crimson curtains framing stage, gentlemen in black tailcoats and ladies with elaborate hairstyles and jewelry, soft gaslight creating warm golden atmosphere, shadows dancing on marble columns
scene.background: Multiple tiers of theater boxes filled with Warsaw's elite, stage area with performance in progress creating distant glow
scene.atmosphere: Electric moment of instant obsession crystallizing, contrast between social spectacle and private emotional earthquake, sense of destiny beginning to unfold, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot showing the vertical relationship between the elevated theater box and hidden observer
composition.focus: The visual line connecting the watching man to the unknowing woman
composition.depth: Foreground: shadowed observer, middle: theater architecture and audience, background: illuminated theater box with the woman
